Computer Science.description: Problem-solving through code and technology. Involves programming, algorithms, and software development.

Psychology.description: Study of behavior and the mind. Understanding human thoughts, emotions, and behaviors.

Business.description: Leadership and decision-making in organizational settings. Focus on management, strategy, and entrepreneurship.

Fine Arts.description: Creative expression through various artistic mediums. Developing artistic skills and creative vision.

Biology.description: Study of living organisms and life processes. Research-focused with laboratory work and scientific inquiry.
